games.name: Diablo IV
games.description: Diablo IV is an action role-playing game developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment.

games.name: Destiny 2: Lightfall
games.description: Destiny 2: Lightfall is the newest expansion in the popular multiplayer first-person shooter game Destiny 2.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: Elden Ring is an open world action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

games.name: Dying Light 2
games.description: Dying Light 2 is an open-world survival horror game where players navigate a post-apocalyptic city filled with zombies, making crucial choices that shape the story and the fate of the city's inhabitants.

games.name: Doom Eternal
games.description: Doom Eternal is a fast-paced first-person shooter game where players battle against hordes of demons in a relentless and intense fight for survival.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a futuristic open-world RPG where players immerse themselves in a dystopian city, embracing cybernetic enhancements and navigating a complex narrative filled with intrigue and moral choices.

games.name: Total War: Warhammer 3
games.description: Warhammer 3 is an epic turn-based strategy game set in the fantasy world of Warhammer, where players engage in massive battles and lead diverse armies to conquer and shape the fate of a war-torn realm.
